entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 2:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: W 10 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
